stationery_shop

Class Pen

  • java.lang.Object
    • stationery_shop.Item
      • stationery_shop.Pen

  • public class Pen
extends Item
    Describes a pen including Colour, Costs, Selling Price, Ink Colour and Point.
    Since:
    14-Mar-20017
    See Also:
